text: ==Season summary== After 5 seasons in Serie A, Brescia were relegated. ==Kit== Italian company Kappa became Brescia's kit manufacturers. Banca Lombarda remained sponsors. ==Players== :Squad at end of season ===Left club during season=== ==Competitions== ===Serie A=== ==References== ==Notes== Category:Brescia Calcio seasons Brescia
title: 2004–05 Brescia Calcio season
